item.title: Illusionism
item.author: masonhall@gmail.com (Mason Hall)
item.description: How is the mind related to the body? The case for Illusionism By Mason Hall Conscious experience is at once the most familiar thing in the world and the most mysterious David Chalmers In this paper I explore the implications of Illusionism on the so-called ‘hard problem of consciousness’ (Chalmers, 1995, 1996), and argue that a strong form of the hypothesis is required to dissolve the hard problem to an easy one.
